title: Revenue of the global eSports market 2012 to 2022
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 865.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 655.0 was reached at Year 2017
